DOC.brief_summary: This study is intended to find the optimal length of pre-inserted ETT for nasal fiberoptic intubation and the equation to predict it.
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Length of Pre-inserted ETT for Nasal Fiber Optic Intubation
DOC.criteria: ASA physical status III aged 2065 yr (adults) rhinitis bleeding diatheses requirement of awake intubation a previous major oral and maxillofacial surgery history anatomical deformity of the face, neck and upper airway
DOC.keyword: Airway management; Fiber optic technology; Intubation
